body.section: Hierarchy SupplementalFeedingRequest is a kind of DieteticsRequest

section.title: Description
section.p: A record of the menu of food items that is requested as part of an order.

stentry.p: A menu of food items that is requested as part of an order.
A particular feeding (e.g., the first 10 AM feeding, the second 10 AM feeding, the first 2 PM feeding, the second 2 PM feeding, etc.) for which a menu item is requested.
